10.8.19  5:14 am   Okay but why is 432 Park Avenue so ugly

      most likely piano

10.8.19  12:02 am   When will you upload more videos?

10.7.19  10:58 pm   Do you use ClipJump? If not, do you use any other sort of clipboard management tools?

      i actually have a question about that , .... is there any way to seriously save the contents of a clipboard to a file? i know if it's text that's easy, but what if you copied some unique and distinct fligamafloo from some program, and it's perfectly cool to just paste it right back into the program, .... but what if tomorrow morning i want to go into that program and paste it out of nowhere? how can i save a special object from the clipboard to a file, to be returned to the clipboard at a later time? i use keyboard maestro by the way. and this is assuming i don't want to leave a billion clipboards hanging around ...... do it from a file ...? hopefully that makes sense, let me know if you have any tips

10.7.19  10:45 pm   10.7.19  4:09 pm Oh my gosh this comment just made me realize that you are learning to play your new creation software just as freely and fluidly as you play all of your other instruments. My mind is blown. You're going to make videos the same way you play the freakin keys. 

      one would think that's not too much to ask ..............

10.7.19  10:23 pm   how do i get into music production / working with daws

      step 1, get one. (start with a simple one) ... (a good trick is check to see if you already have one ..... sometimes people already have one and don't even realize it)

10.7.19  9:54 pm   what do you do when you feel like giving up?

      stop drop and re-evaluate

10.7.19  9:22 pm   ive been taking piano lessons for a while and i usually only play classical music, but i kinda want to branch out into jazz. i have a pretty basic knowledge of chords, but nothing too fancy. what do you think is the best approach to learning more about chords, improvisation, etc.?

      when you say 'classical', if you mean you are reading every note, then i'd say a good start is just to sit down at the instrument and start seeing what it can do. you're probably going to have to learn to make the notes up instead of reading them

10.7.19  8:58 pm   could you please continue to exist?

      i'll see what i can do

      blog about it

      that would be interesting ..... give them a taste of their own medicine

10.7.19  8:12 pm   How do love and relationships work?

      i'm not sure

      no, but let's just say i did a lot of "deductive reasoning"

10.7.19  4:26 pm   Why did you start making music?

      i realized it was already making me, so i might as well join the race

10.7.19  4:09 pm   Do you use Taran VanHermert's methods for your keyboard shortcuts?  (wrapping keystrokes in f13-f24, then macros w/ autohotkey)  Or something else?

      different operating system, so the methods will be different, but it seems like i've actually had a much easier time overall. i'm up to 9 keyboards, with a working virtual display that dynamically updates itself (so i know where the hell things are)

10.7.19  3:49 pm   Do you have any plans on collabing with other artists soon ?

      that could work

10.7.19  3:32 pm   10.5.19  9:07 am could you elaborate on the special re-set ritual?

      mine is touch the door, but everyone can have a different one. maybe take a day off. but not everyone has time to take a day off between every take

10.7.19  3:10 pm   why is 432 park avenue so tall and skinny?

      because there's hardly any space left on the ground in new york. only way to go is up. as building technology improves, buildings can go up at a more passionate rate

      maybe these times but also in every video i've ever made, i think

      not before something better comes along

      probably this one so far, although i admit it looks pretty drim

     PAM

      i have to let them come up with me

\\\\\\\\\\

      i think some of them were read wrong at some point

The hi I'm Steve video can you tell me the whole meaning behind it

     only if you consider THINKING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!,and having thoughts;;;;;; to be an issue

10.7.19  10:45 am   Why is Bohemian Rhapsody a great song?

      could be the florid existential meltdown

10.7.19  10:32 am   What goes the 11th harmonic sound like? I've been googling it but I can't find what is sounds like.

      i'm not sure which is which, and whether the numbering you're looking for starts with 0 or 1, but here is the harmonic series, if you have a very low C (around 33hz). the next note is an octave up, (65) then the next G up (around 98) then another C (131), then something around E (around 178) that will wring perfectly in a chord with C (even better than standard E), then the next G (196) then something about halfway in between A and Bb (around 226??) (they are all getting closer together.) then C again (262) then something around D (294?) then another E which rings perfectly in harmony with C (327.5), then, this might be the one you're looking for, something that's like exactly halfway between E and G. so it will be somewhere between F and F#. 360.25. not good. then the next one is another clean G. then some more ugly in between ones. did we get to the one you want yet

10.7.19  10:18 am   How in gods good will am I supposed to play drums with a midi keyboard??

      step 1, make sure it's dynamic sensitive (obviously) .... then, break the kit down in a different way: consider it more like 4 instruments. 1 is kick and snare, 2 is cyms, 3 and 4 are both percussion. actually 3 through 7 should be percussion. just do all the percussion first, and you're gonna be fine. quantize at 50% strength and add just the tiniest hair of swing, even if it's considered straight. you should be good to go. if you get hung up, do a little "writing" or pre-arranging: sit in a chair like you're a drummer, and pretend you're the drummer on the song. just imagine playing through it and figure out what you did. write it down and then put it together

10.7.19  10:16 am   What is the worst item you own?

      tzumi dream vision

      it depends how much space you have

10.7.19  3:04 am   10.6.19  8:59 pm   when you got to the bit with the honga-changa-honga-changa in Just Did A Bad Thing, how did you stop your fingers from getting tied up in knots? Did you have to play the multiple parts separately, then put them together?

      you'd have to give me a time quote on that, so i can be sure what it is. i might probably know what that is if i had actually heard the song recently, but i haven't heard it since december so you'll have to assist me a little

      to have energy for more dreams
